RNA Module Function Index

Quick reference table for all Python functions in the METAINFORMANT RNA module.

Amalgkit Step Functions

High-level wrappers for amalgkit CLI subcommands.

Function

Module

Description

Documentation

metadata

metainformant.rna.amalgkit

Retrieve RNA-seq metadata from NCBI SRA/ENA

metadata.md

integrate

metainformant.rna.amalgkit

Integrate FASTQ paths into metadata

integrate.md

config

metainformant.rna.amalgkit

Generate configuration files

config.md

select

metainformant.rna.amalgkit

Filter SRA entries by quality

select.md

getfastq

metainformant.rna.amalgkit

Download and convert SRA to FASTQ

getfastq.md

quant

metainformant.rna.amalgkit

Quantify transcript abundances

quant.md

merge

metainformant.rna.amalgkit

Merge quantification results

merge.md

cstmm

metainformant.rna.amalgkit

Cross-species TMM normalization

cstmm.md

curate

metainformant.rna.amalgkit

Quality control and batch correction

curate.md

csca

metainformant.rna.amalgkit

Cross-species correlation analysis

csca.md

sanity

metainformant.rna.amalgkit

Validate workflow outputs

sanity.md
